name: zipcodesbyids
description:
This is a sub-function API for tool mapreflex.
Tool description: US Zip Codes, Cities, States and Counties boundaries API, which provides info in common GeoJson format for instant integration with existing maps like Google, etc., or with your custom application.
API description: Get boundaries of given ZIP Codes (in GeoJSON format). For a quick view, copy and paste results: http://geojsonlint.com

ids.description: Comma-separated list of ZIP Code IDs. Maximum size is 200. Example: '10021,10022,10023'.

properties.description: Customize feature properties to include. In case of ZIP Code - set of [\"zip\", \"centroid\", \"aland\", \"awater\"]. Default value includes all properties: zip,centroid,aland,awater .
